translations.translation: Certainly it is guidance and a mercy for the muminun.
It is a guidance and grace for those who believe.
and it is a guidance and mercy for the believers.
It is a guide and mercy for the believers.
And indeed it is a guidance and a mercy for the Muslims.
And truly, it is a guide and a mercy for the believers.
And most surely it is a guidance and a mercy for the believers.
it is a guidance, and a mercy unto the believers.
And lo! it is a guidance and a mercy for believers.
certainly it is guidance and a blessing for the believers.
And verily it is a guidance and a mercy unto the believers.
and it is indeed a guidance and mercy for the faithful.
And it certainly is a Guide and a Mercy to those who believe.
And truly, it (this Quran) is a guide and a mercy to the believers.
It is a guidance and a mercy to believers.
And it is guidance and mercy for the believers.
And indeed, it is guidance and mercy for the believers.
[27:77] And truly it is a guidance, from error, and a mercy for believers, from chastisement.
(And lo! It) i.e. the Qur'an (is a guidance) from error (and a mercy) shielding from the torment (for believers) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَإِنَّهُ } في نفسه { لَهُدًى } هادٍ موصل إلى طريق التوحيد { وَرَحْمَةٌ } نازلة { لِّلْمُؤمِنِينَ } [النمل: 77] الموحدين المحمديين من قبل الحق
 ليهديهم إلى وحدة ذاته ويوصلهم إلى غاية ما جبلوا لأجله من المعرفة والتوحيد

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وإنه } - أي: القرآن { لهُدىً ورحمةٌ للمؤمنين } على الإطلاق
 فيدخل فيهم من آمن من بني إسرائيل دخولاً أولياً
 { إنَّ ربك يقضي بينهم } أي: بين بني إسرائيل
 أو: بين من آمن بالقرآن ومن كفر به
